text: Allahtan unkalai (arampattil) mannal urpatti ceytan. Pinnar, oru tuli intiriyattiliruntu (pataittan). Pinnar, (an, pen joti) jotiyaka unkalai akkinan. Avan ariyamal oru pen karppamavatum illai; piracavippatum illai. Avanutaiya â€˜lavhul mahhpulil' illamal evanutaiya vayatum atikarippatumillai; kuraintu vituvatum illai. Niccayamaka i(vai anaittaiyum arintiruppa)tu allahvukkuc culapamanate
